summary: The diff implements a significant portion of the GreenLeaf e-commerce plant store interface with animations and interactivity. Most core requirements are present, but several specific animation features and pages are missing or not fully implemented based on the diff evidence.

missing_requirements.requirement: Hero section with slow floating animation on plants/leaves, subtle background gradient movement, and scroll indicator animation
missing_requirements.reason: Home.tsx is not included in the diff. Without evidence of the hero section implementation, cannot verify floating animations, gradient movement, or scroll indicator.

missing_requirements.requirement: Featured categories section with hover animations including card lift, image zoom, and shadow expansion
missing_requirements.reason: Home.tsx is not included in the diff. Cannot verify featured categories section or its hover animations.

missing_requirements.requirement: Best-selling plants carousel with smooth sliding transitions, navigation controls, touch-enabled, and auto-play
missing_requirements.reason: No carousel component found in diff. Home.tsx not included to verify carousel implementation.

missing_requirements.requirement: Benefits section with animated icons that trigger on scroll into view
missing_requirements.reason: Home.tsx not included. No benefits section component found in diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Testimonials section with automatic sliding carousel animation
missing_requirements.reason: Home.tsx not included. No testimonials carousel component found in diff. Testimonials data exists but implementation not shown.

missing_requirements.requirement: Newsletter signup section with soft motion effects and input animations
missing_requirements.reason: No newsletter component found in diff. Home.tsx not included to verify implementation.

missing_requirements.requirement: Shop page with animated product grid using fade and upward motion on scroll with staggered timing
missing_requirements.reason: Shop.tsx not included in diff. Cannot verify scroll-triggered animations with staggered delays.

missing_requirements.requirement: Filter sidebar with sliding interaction, animated filter selection with visual feedback, and mobile drawer animation
missing_requirements.reason: Shop.tsx not included. No filter sidebar component found in diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Smooth pagination transitions between product pages
missing_requirements.reason: Shop.tsx not included. No pagination component found in diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Product detail page with image gallery smooth transitions, animated care indicators, expandable accordion sections, and related products slider
missing_requirements.reason: ProductDetail.tsx not included in diff. Cannot verify gallery transitions, care indicator animations, accordion sections, or related products slider.

missing_requirements.requirement: Plant care guide page with scroll-triggered animations for article entries and sticky reading progress bar
missing_requirements.reason: CareGuide.tsx not included in diff. Cannot verify scroll-triggered animations or progress bar implementation.

missing_requirements.requirement: Checkout page with smooth form transitions, elegant focus states, and validation animations
missing_requirements.reason: Checkout.tsx not included in diff. Cannot verify form transitions or validation animations.

missing_requirements.requirement: Smooth inertia scrolling with parallax scrolling between sections where plants float slightly while scrolling
missing_requirements.reason: No evidence of inertia scrolling or parallax implementation in included files. Would require specific scroll handling code or library integration.

missing_requirements.requirement: Button ripple or glow effect on interaction for all primary action buttons
missing_requirements.reason: No ripple or glow effect implementation found in button interactions. ProductCard and CartDrawer buttons show scale transforms but not ripple effects.

missing_requirements.requirement: Smooth dropdown expansion animations for all dropdown menus and select controls
missing_requirements.reason: No dropdown or select components found in diff. Cannot verify dropdown expansion animations.

missing_requirements.requirement: Loading animation using leaf or growing plant concept that appears during page transitions or data loading
missing_requirements.reason: LoadingSpinner.tsx shows a simple circular spinner, not a leaf or plant-themed loading animation as specified.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend actor system with Internet Identity integration
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly states as non-goal: 'Implementing user authentication with Internet Identity'. The diff includes useActor.ts and useInternetIdentity.ts implementing Internet Identity authentication.
BuildRequest constraint states 'Do not create any backend functionality or database integration'. A backend/main.mo file exists in the diff.
BuildRequest specifies minimal luxury eco aesthetic with soft green and earthy tones. No requirement mentions dark mode or theme switching functionality.
